scenes.background: You acknowledged Bobs comment and clarified your intention. Monica looks at you and says:
scenes.description: Are you sure you can really help now? Youre supposed to be on leave.

options.text: I can manage. Let's just focus on getting this done.
options.analysis: You redirected the focus to task completion, showing good social skills and motivation, but lacking in empathy and self-regulation.

options.text: I understand your concern, Monica. I'll help as much as I can and then step back.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Monica's concern and offered a balanced approach, demonstrating strong perception and empathy.

options.text: If it's too much, maybe we should delegate it to someone else.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical solution, showing motivation and social skills, but lacked empathy and perception.
